additional_data.description: The spirit of a kotatsu, a traditional heater table, considered to be one of the "three sacred treasures" of the winter. She says warming up in a kotatsu is life's greatest joy, and few can resist her allure on a cold day. She has transformed many a chilly person into an unmoving do-nothing. Even if you manage to escape, she is always right there all winter, ready to suck you back in. That explains why she is known as the "black hole" around the Bureau of the Occult.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Clear Chapter 1
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Exchange for 200 Tiny Present
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Get a First Half Ranking of 6001-10000.
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 7501-10000.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the drop rate of Tiny Present during the "Shadow over Christmas" event.

main: "Whaaat better place to be in winter than a kotatsu? It's paaaradise!"
limit_break: "I feel so toooasty warm, inside and out!"
